title: OpenProject Installation
description: Set up OpenProject for comprehensive project management with team collaboration and reporting features.
detailedDescription: Deploy and configure OpenProject, a powerful open-source project management platform. I set up complete project workflows, team collaboration tools, time tracking, and reporting dashboards. Perfect for teams looking for a comprehensive project management solution with full control over their data.
